#### Tender Details

The Communications Research Centre (CRC), a department of Innovation, Science and Economic Development Canada, is inviting contractors to bid on the Building 42 Bus Maintenance and MV Switch Gear Retrofit and Refurbishment project. The project involves providing labor, materials, and equipment for the maintenance and upgrade of bus maintenance facilities and MV switch gear at the CRC campus, located at 3701 Carling Avenue, Ottawa, ON.

#### Mandatory Site Visit

A mandatory site visit is required for all bidders. The visit will take place on Wednesday, October 11, 2023, at 10:00 a.m. Eastern Daylight Time. Bidders who do not attend the site visit cannot submit a bid.

To confirm attendance and provide the names of the persons attending, bidders must contact the Contracting Authority at crcbidreceiving-receptiondesoffrescrc@ised-isde.gc.ca by Tuesday, October 10, 2023, at 12:00 p.m. EDT. Photo identification is required for access to the campus.

#### Tender Submission

Only bidders who have attended the mandatory site visit will be eligible to submit a bid. The bid submission deadline is October 26, 2023, at 2:00 p.m. local time.

#### Tender Evaluation

The tender will be evaluated based on a combined rating of technical merit and price.

#### Contact Information

For more information, please contact Kelly Stauffer at kelly.stauffer@ised-isde.gc.ca or (613) 990-8812.

#### Procurement Details

* Procurement Category: Contract
* Procurement Method: Competitive
* Procurement Status: Expired
